Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory730.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: '...Sniff. The scent is different.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Smelling a light aroma in the air, you presume the mechanoids who built this place installed some air fresheners to mimic "fragrance."'}
{3: 'Although a long time has passed, the light sweetness still lingers in the air.'}
{2: "It's probably used to create the spring atmosphere.", 3: '8'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: '...Spring? Is it for chameleons to mate?', 4: '1'}
{2: "I guess that's one way to view it.", 3: '11', 4: "I don't think spring is just for that.", 5: '13'}
{3: 'Before you can react, No. 21 climbs up the pillar.'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Not just for that? Why is it?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Before you can explain, No. 21 climbs up the pillar.'}
{2: "(Briefly explain chameleons' mating to No. 21)", 3: '18'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'So they die after mating?', 4: '1'}
{2: "It's just the law of nature.", 3: '21'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "I won't sit by and watch you die.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "I will take you away. We'll leave together.", 4: '1'}
{3: "You are not sure how to explain it, but seeing No. 21's resolute expression, you cannot help but pat her head."}
{3: 'She looks slightly confused before acting determined again.'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Is it time for us to "leave together"?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: 'She grabs you before you can elaborate further and starts running forward.'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'I will take you away, Commandant. We will leave together.', 4: '1'}
